Speaker: Nathan
Text: Dante…

Speaker: Dante
Text: I got a report that shots were fired by the river.

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: It was nothing.

Speaker: Dante
Text: I'm telling you it was Drake. You can tell your men to up their game or there's going to be a lot less of them around come payday.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: …son of a bitch. I'll see you in hell.

Speaker: Prologue
Text: "I'm Telling You… It Was Drake…"
[Nathan climbing on the other side of the ruins.]

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Drake's been spotted, the upper chamber. Kill him on sight. Dante's orders.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: One of Dante's mercenaries… Bastards…
[Nathan makes his way through the ruins eliminating mercenaries. When he trying to get to the other side, he spotted by a mercenary with RPG.]

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: I got him! You're a dead man! See how you like this!
[The mercenary shoots at Nathan and he falls.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Oh, damn it… jeez. Damn muddy roads. I just got these cleaned.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Those are fancy.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: They sell men's shoes where you got those?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Oh, very funny. Mr. Nathan Drake, always good for a laugh. Hey, look at the these. Sea-turtle. You know how much they set me back?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What's the matter? Couldn't find you baby hippo boots?

Speaker: Dante
Text: So, now you've joined Greenpeace all of a sudden?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: It's just I don't go around wearing endangered species on my feet.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yeah, well they cost me a lot. More dough than you make in a year.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Oh yeah? Which year? I've had a couple of good ones.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Oh really?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: OK, one.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hey Einstein.

Speaker: Dante
Text: What?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Do you know these says 'Keep Out'…

Speaker: Dante
Text: Oh, you can read Spanish? Yeah I know that. We got special permission.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I always said you were special.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yeah, funny guy. From here? - We take the scenic route.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Last time we took the "scenic route" I would up in a ditch behind the Taj Mahal. Naked.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Well it doesn't get any more scenic then that. Does it?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Are you keepin' up, or what?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What's the hurry?

Speaker: Dante
Text: There's no hurry… We just got a lot to see.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Well, since when you are a rock climber?

Speaker: Dante
Text: I'm not, I'm a rope climber.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Uh, huh. Cute.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Remember what Sully used to say? Necessity breeds invention.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Trust me, you don't want to hear Sully talk about 'inventive breeding.'

Speaker: Dante
Text: Quite at the father figure. Up we go.
[On the next cliff…]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Damn it, where's my rope?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I'm no expert, but I'd say it's been cut.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Guerro, that son of a bitch.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Wait… what did you say? Guerro? Drug runner, I kidnap-tourist-for-ransom, blow-up-the-Panama-canal Roberto Guerro?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Oh, you've heard of him?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Deaf kids in Caracas have heard of him. Dante, please tell me we're not in General Loco's backyard?

Speaker: Dante
Text: He ain't a goddamn general no more, alright? The revolutionaries lost of the war, remember? And besides, now he's just another pain in my ass. And… Drake, don't worry, Guerro don't go where I'm taking you.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: OK, so now you're a rock climber. This I gotta see.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Just don't stare at my ass, and try to keep up.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Whoa. You don't see that every day. This why I'm here?

Speaker: Dante
Text: You ain’t seen nothing yet. Come on.
[They start to climb.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Feel how worn these hand holds are? What'd ya think? Three thousand years old? Four?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: They feel like the ones at Mesa Verde. Remember? You were so scared, I thought you were gonna cry.

Speaker: Dante
Text: That was different. It was dark, and twice as high and I had a bag of pottery shards strapped to my back.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I saw tears.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Careful. It's a long way down.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hey, I was the one who taught you how to do his, remember?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yeah sure, whatever you say.
[They find a bridge.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: This is the ‘great mystery’ that ‘only I can solve’?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Keep your pants on, will ya? I’m getting to it. Alright, see our squat little friends here? Shit like this’s scattered everywhere up on this ridge. So, c’mon smart guy, tell me who made ‘em.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You're quizzing me? Oh, I never thought I’d see the day.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Just makin’ sure you’re worth the price of admission.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hmm. Look at this.
[Nate makes charcoal copy of pillar’s carving.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Alright, hey, try this guy.
[They cross to another side of the bridge.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Let’s try those. Be careful. Watch your step, these planks are slippery as hell.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah, especially if you’re wearing seaturtle boots.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Its called style, Drake! You should try it once in awhile — you with your sneakers. Sheesh. You look like my Uncle Mikey.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Careful.

Speaker: Dante
Text: I hate this.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You still afraid of heights?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Heights? No. Falling to death, yeah.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: If you do fall, you want me to bury you in those shoes?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Sure. As long as you get to wear your sneakers to the funeral. No dying on me now. Not while I still need you.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Thanks for your concern.

Speaker: Dante
Text: No problemo. That’s what friends are for, right?
[Nate makes another charcoal copy.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Looks like I need one more.
[After making the last copy Nate assemble the puzzle.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: It’s about damn time. Whaddya think it is?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Well it’s not Mayan or Aztec.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yeah?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I’d say Muisca, but they never migrated north of Colombia.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Nathan Drake, walking encyclopedia.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: The Kuna? They were in this part of Central America.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Come on I’ve got more to show you.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Whoa, whoa, whoah! Watch this log… it’s a little squirrely!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Squirrely? Where’d your learn that? Girl scouts?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What, are you king of the jungle?

Speaker: Dante
Text: It’s a rope Drake, not a vine.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Damn monsoons keep washing out the trail.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: There a reason we didn't just follow the road?

Speaker: Dante
Text: And miss all this?

Speaker: Dante
Text: See, what’d I tell ya? Shit like this is everywhere up here. Most of ‘em? Never touched.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Looks like your General Guerro wants to keep it that way.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Goddamn it, I told you, he ain't a general no more. Now, come on.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Hey, there's something there. Can you reach it?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Maybe, hold on.
[Nathan takes his first treasure.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Hey, hey. Everything you find up here is mine you know. We're almost there.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hold on. There's a glyph that looks like the one from the bridge statues.
[Dante can not wait to look at the found treasure.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Gimme it, lemme see, lemme see.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: It's right here, relax. It's turquoise. It's a glyph of some kind. The style matches the symbol at the rope bridge.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Glyph, shmyph. You know what this thing's worth? And it's just the beginning. C'mon. This way.
[The heroes cross a boisterous river, jumping over rocks.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Now we're havin' fun.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: It you say so!

Speaker: Dante
Text: Whoa, watch that one.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hate to admit it, but you just might be right for a change.

Speaker: Dante
Text: I'm always right. That's why you still hang out with me. An ugly bastard, ain't he?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: And you say ruins like this are scattered everywhere?

Speaker: Dante
Text: A hundred square miles of the stuff. Come on, we gotta go up through that gully up there.
[Heroes climb the huge statue …]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Try not to kick him in the junk. He's kind of sensitive.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: When's that ever stopped you?
[Heroes walking along a fallen tree …]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Hey, you see that up there?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Why don't you go take a look.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Is that why I'm here… to be your errand boy?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Ok, never mind. It's behind that thicket of bamboo. You can't get to it anyway.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Oh really?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What do you think I brought this for?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Oh I thought you were playin' pirates or something.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Alright. Wait here for me.

Speaker: Dante
Text: OK.
[Nate starts chopping down the trees with his machete.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: This is why we need clear cutting. Monsoons wash all this shit down through the canyons… See, they make it hard to get anywhere. Look at my boots!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah, they invented something that fixed that… They're called 'roads'.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Oh, roads, yeah. Well up here they can be even more dangerous. Trust me.
[At the fork…]

Speaker: Dante
Text: This road leads back down to the strip mine, where we started.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Oh, so we took the short cut?

Speaker: Dante
Text: It's the scenic route, smart ass. We're almost there.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Who's shooting at us?

Speaker: Dante
Text: How do I know? Must be poachers. They come up here all the time.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Maybe Guerro's men?

Speaker: Dante
Text: No, I told you. Guerro don't come up here.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You know how to shoot that, or did you just bring it to look cool?
[After the shootout, the heroes climb onto a huge truck to get to the other side.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: These guys ain't fooling around.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Great place to park a tractor.

Speaker: Dante
Text: The miners discovered all of this when they were cutting the road. They were pissed as hell when they had to shut it down.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah I bet. Who needs all this rainforest?
[Soon Nathan sees another fence …]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Since when did the IOA start using razor wire?

Speaker: Dante
Text: You know how many footers they get down here each year?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Didn't keep you out.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Oh yeah. That's because I'm special. Don't go there, alright?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I didn't say anything.

Speaker: Dante
Text: You had that look in your eye. Here… here's the combination.
[Nathan opens the combination lock, then tries to push back the heavy iron door.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: I'm just sayin'… nice job.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: By the numbers. Ugh. Don't bother helping.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yo got it.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Ugggh. No really, I got this.

Speaker: Dante
Text: OK.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Ugggh. Thanks for your help.

Speaker: Dante
Text: No problemo. That's what friends are for.
[Heroes go to the site of massive excavations…]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Here we are. Whaddya think, huh?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: It's a mass grave, obviously.

Speaker: Dante
Text: They dug up over 60 of the poor bastards. That's a lotta bones. Here.
[Dante gives Nathan an old helmet.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hmmm. Spanish.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: How old?

Speaker: Dante
Text: You tell me.
[Nate cleans the helmet incidentally sharing with Dante his knowledge in archeology.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yeah I knew that.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: 16th century. New Spain. These guys died a long way from home.

Speaker: Girl
Text: They didn't just die. They were murdered.
[Nate points his pistol at her.]

Speaker: Girl
Text: Oh, hey, hey, hey, whoa there, pal.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Chase, what are you doing out here?

Speaker: Chase
Text: Oh, I don't know. You said you were going out to get supplies, and seeing how you never lie to me, I followed you.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Oh, you followed me. Well, it's not like I don't have enough problems.

Speaker: Chase
Text: Humm, humm.

Speaker: Dante
Text: This is… Nathan Drake - he's a buddy of mine from the old days.

Speaker: Chase
Text: Hi, Marisa Chase.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Nate, call me Nate.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Strong hands. I like that. Nope. You're not one of Dante's 'buddies' no prison tats!

Speaker: Dante
Text: You have no idea.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You've got a strong grip yourself. You guys wanna tell me what you're doing up here?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Sure, you'll be the first to know - once I find out.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. Look, we're just doin' a little business, alright? Here. And I did tell you about him, you just weren't listening.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Uh, no, you didn't.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Oh yes, I did.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: No, you didn't.

Speaker: Dante
Text: I… What now?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Guerro?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yes I did.
[Dante is talking over the radio.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: Go ahead. What? What's he doing? No, no, no, no, no, no. That wasn't even part of the… Alright, I'm on my way.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Let me guess, you missed a payment to Guerro again.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Don't you worry your pretty little head about it I got this.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What the hell's going on?

Speaker: Dante
Text: Would you put that thing away. It's nothing. It's just a little misunderstanding, that's all. All right? I'm gonna be right back. And don't just stand there. Make yourself useful, you know, show him around or something. But - don't dig up anything without me, you got it?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Dante, wait a minute!

Speaker: Dante
Text: Eh, I got my eye on you two!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Wow, he's really pissed them off this time.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: It's one of the few things he's actually good at. And you… why don't you tell me what you're doing spying on your partner?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Partners… right. Sorta how the Spanish were 'partners' with the Kuna. Spanish got the gold, while the Kuna got the shaft.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You know what happened here? It looks to me like the Spanish are the ones who got the shaft.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: We don't know. These soldiers were murdered, and not by the Kuna. Look for yourself.
[Nathan checks one of the skulls.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: There are no crush marks. Kuna use maces.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Exactly. These soldiers were poisoned. All of them.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Poisoned?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Arsenic. We found traces in the teeth fragments.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: So this is the great mystery that Dante says is worth a fortune? I don't get it.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Wait a minute. Wait a minute. He did mention you - oh, you're the 'expert' on, on, esoteric books, maps, artifacts.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Right… like Dante would know what 'esoteric' means.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: This. This is why you're here.
[Marisa shows Nate a huge stone with symbols carved on it.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: A grave marker?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Is it?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: The markings aren't Spanish.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: No, no it's like nothing we've ever seen before. No one has any idea what it means.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hmmm.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: You know…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What? Uh, no, no.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: You know what it means.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: No.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh come on… I've been around treasure hunters my entire life - I know that look when I see it.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I don't know what you’re talking about…

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Ok. Well you know what? Dante's trying to cut me out, and you know he'll do the same to you. So let's you and me be partners.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Jesus.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: C'mon, c'mon… tell me.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Give me one good reason why I should.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: I'll give you two.
[She starts to undress.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Really? I don't think this is the place…

Speaker: Marisa
Text: First, because you can actually trust me. And second… Because Dante hasn't seen this.
[Marisa shows Nate the medallion.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Alright, now that's a good reason.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Uh-uh. Partners?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: No.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: What? Why?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: If you, know… Dante at all, you know he's not the kind of guy you should cross.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Alright, whatever.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Well, wait… doesn't mean we can't still… cut a deal. Just, leave Dante out of it, right? You show me yours, and I'll show you mine.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: I don't know why I trust you, but I do. Here.
[Marisa gives Nate a look at the medallion, incidentally talking about what's on it.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I've never seen anything like it.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Hello? Uh… your turn?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Oh, right, uh. Sorry. Grab my pack for me, will ya? Thanks. Here.
[Nate goes to the huge stone.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Ok, first of all, believe it or not, this symbol is Visigoth.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Visigoth? No, it can't be.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I know. The last of the Visigoth kings died in the, what, 8th century? Long before the Spanish conquered all of this. But look -
[Nate makes a copy of the image on the stone with coal and paper.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: A charcoal rubbing? How very cool.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah, see, the faint markings go all around the symbol.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: How did we miss this? Now I know why Dante wanted you up here. So, uh, do you know what it means?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: No. Unless…

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Unless what?
[The explosion is heard and shooting starts.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Get down! C'mon! Back here! Here.
[The explosion is heard and shooting starts.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: No - I can't.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What? Fine. Stay here and keep your head down!
[After the shootout …]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Doesn't look like Dante's cleared up his 'little misunderstanding' yet.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Hey, you're not going to tell him about our secret, are you?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Uh, let's worry about that after we get out of here.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Ok, ok. You're right. It's just that…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Never mind. Hey, come on. I know a trail we can take that leads to the strip mine.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Great, another shortcut.
[Nate and Marisa climb the mountain on a rope. After a while, Nate notices the sign of radioactive danger on the fence.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Well that's just great - we’re going to start glowing in the dark?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: No. That's the tailing area from the old uranium mine. A world Superfund site in the making.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Let me guess: that's where we're going.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yep. After you.

Speaker: Guerro’s Mercenary 1
Text: Guerro said to stay here.

Speaker: Guerro’s Mercenary 2
Text: No, we stay here, guard the passage in. Shut up and patrol.
[Nate quietly assassinates the mercenaries and walks to the river with a tree pawned through it.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Over here.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Oh, are you sure this is the trail you took?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: It's safer than it looks.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I'm not worried about me… I do this for a living.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: I'll be fine. Come on. Whoah, whoah. Alright, ya know why don't I just stay here until you get across.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah, maybe that's a good idea.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nate! Oh, no! Nate!?
[Mercenaries appear in the middle of the path and start shooting.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Ok, now!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh my God!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Go! Go! Go! Well, it looks like it's my turn.
[Nate goes over to the other side, and they move on.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Hey. I came up this way!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: More ropes… great… Hey, Guerro's men like to cut these you know…

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Would you hurry!?
[While heroes descends, mercenaries attacks them.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: They're gonna cut the rope…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I told you! Let me see hat I can do.
[At the next precipice…]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh, great.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hey, wait, whoah, whoah! Careful!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Uhuh, don't worry about it. Doing this since I was fifteen.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Of course you have. C'mon.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Ahh, nope. Not going that way. Guerro's men have cut my rope, again.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Seems to be a habit for him. Wait, wait. Dante said Guerro's never been up here.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah, well, Dante says a lot of things.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Great. Alright, we came up from over there. There's another trail that leads down to the road.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah, I know. But… but, so does Guerro.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You have any other ideas? No, I guess not. C'mon.
[At yet another precipice…]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Alright, listen. When you jump, just make sure…

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Aahhh!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Whoah!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Whew. Oh, sorry. You were saying?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Uh… heh. Since you were fifteen, huh?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yep.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Nice.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Thanks.
[Heroes walk along the narrow edge of the cliff above an unsuspecting mercenary.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Careful.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Kay… I am.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You alright?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Wait. Wait here. Gotta time this just right…
[Nate picks the moment and jumps on the mercenary.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: This isn't one of Guerro's thugs.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: It’s one of Dante’s men… hired to guard the site.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hmph… Well he's doing a good job. He had this. Looks like -he was after more.
[Nate shows Marisa the first treasure he found.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: This is what set Guerro off… he's pretty strict about where we can excavate.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Excavate? Is that what Dante's calling it?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: It's what I call it. Dante calls it 'portfolio enhancement'.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Sure, if a "bookie account's" a portfolio. Let's go.

Speaker: Chapter 3
Text: “Nothing But Some Old Bones”

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nate, look out! More of Guerro's men.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Get down!
[Nathan defeats all enemies.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh, I hate this bridge.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah. I'm not too crazy about it either. OK, looks clear. C'mon.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: See? This is why I didn't wanna come this way.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Ok, whatever you do, don't stop. If more of Guerro's men show up…

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah, yeah, alright. You don't have to tell me. Okay, here goes. Whoa… It's never been this wobbly…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: The ropes… They've been cut.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: It's not going to hold us…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Oh crap… Jump, jump…
[The bridge collapses but Nate manages to grab hold of the boards.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nate? You made it!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah, I don't know how, but I did!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: How did you do that?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Uh… Years of practice… You hurt?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: No, I'm fine. You're bleeding!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: A little blood I can live with. Or not…

Speaker: Marisa
Text: There's no way down… I can't get to you.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Just stay there, keep your head down. I'll find another way across.
[Nate climbs onto a rock above the location of Marisa and sees mercenaries behind her.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Oh crap. No, no, no, no. Behind you. Yes.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Ah… Oh no… They--they're shooting at me! Uh, hello? Uh… help… over here!
[Nate kills mercenaries from a sniper rifle.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh god, Nate! They’re gone. Man, they would have killed me.
[Nate goes to Marisa.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Wow, that was impressive.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You liked that, huh?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah. What, were you raised in a circus, or something?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Let's just say I've been doing this even longer than you have.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah. But like someone once said… it's a 'long story.'

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Fair enough.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: It looks clear. Dante's jeep should be over that way.
[They come down from the cliff in a fight with mercenaries (only Nate shoots, of course).]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Jeep's gone. Dante must have taken it.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: And left you stranded here? Oh, no, he wouldn’t do that. C'mon I'm parked over this way. Hey! Since we're 'partners', I'll give you a ride.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: We are not partners!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nate, look out! More of Guerro's men!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Get down!
[The shooting begins, after which the characters find a small scud in the open air.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Stacks of equipment from the mining company. Some of this stuff has been here for years. C’mon, my jeep's over here. This way. Whoa, that's not my jeep.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Easy, easy… don't shoot. Don't shoot.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: It's Dante.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Goddamn it. I almost peed myself.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Put your hands down. I'm not gonna shoot you. As much as I'd like to.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Oh, that makes me feel all warm and fuzzy inside. Thanks. I wasn't talking to you.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Huh?

Speaker: Dante
Text: I was talkin' to them!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh, crap!
[A few armed men come out of the truck.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Guerro?

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Drop it. Now.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Hey you, watch the boots.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Whatever you say.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Hey, ahh, not so friendly.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Senorita Chase, always a pleasure.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: General.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: And senor… ?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Drake, Nathan Drake.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: I must admit, senor Dante, I am very confused. You tell me you are alone, and yet I find a truck full of your men stealing glyphs from my ruins, like so many migrant workers, just picking fruit.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Look, I told them not to touch that stuff…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Excuse me, uh… I'm sorry to interrupt… But, uh, we're not really part of all this… so, why don't Chase and I just head up the road and get out of your way…

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Hey!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Or not.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: And here I see your partner, with yet another of your men.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Well, I'm not one of his men…

Speaker: Dante
Text: Ok, ok, ok. So I took some folks out here today and I forgot to tell you about it. It musta slipped my mind. I'm sorry. Look, we didn't find nothin' but some old bones. I wouldn't lie to you.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Hmmmph. Ahh, c'mon! Ow please!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Get your hands off her.
[Mercenary finds Marisa's medallion.]

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: General! Here.

Speaker: Dante
Text: What the hell, you been holding out on me?

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Ohhh, what's this?!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: It's mine!

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Just some “old bones”, huh? Well! These are some very lovely “old bones” you've found. Search them.

Speaker: Dante
Text: I didn't know.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: No. Wait. Don't touch me!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hello, don't you think you're getting a little personal?! General, what are you doing?!
[A fight begins. Guerro creeps up to Nate with a gun.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Watch out! Guerro, no! Nate!
[Guerro hits Nate with a pistol grip.]

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Some very lovely bones… indeed.
[Nate comes to his consciousness in a cell.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What happened? Great, the pack's gone. What else did they take? Alright. What is that - smoke? Great… pile it on. I can take it.

Speaker: Chapter 4
Text: “Why’s the Building On Fire?”

Speaker: Nathan
Text: …keep going. Woah… woah!
[Nate gets out of the camera and hears the voice of Marisa coming from the window.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nate! Hey, over here. Hurry up.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Chase? What are you doing? Where are we? Where's Dante? Why's the building on fire?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Shhhh! No time. Guerro's men are everywhere. C'mon, get up here! Oh, crap. I gotta go!
[Nate finds her machete.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: They didn't take everything. I got just the thing for this. Now we're cookin'. Oh… crap! Oh this is crazy! Woah, that was close! Ohhh! Not good. Not good. Run! I'm outta here.
[Leaving the burning building, Nate meets Marisa.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Hey, you OK?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I’m fine.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Sorry about that fire. I tried to create a diversion… it kinda got a little out of hand.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah, you could say that. What happened at the dig site? Last thing I remember I was beating up the butt of Guerro's pistol with my face. Oh, looks like you tried the same stunt.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: It's nothing. Guerro took me to his office for a little game of '20 questions.'

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Well, it doesn't look that bad. So much for the soldier's code of honor, huh?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah. When it was Dante's turn, I managed to escape.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Dante? Where is he?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: They still have him.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Alright. Show me where. We need to grab him and get the hell out of here. C'mon.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: No, no, no! Wait, wait, wait! Guerro still has my amulet. Look, I'm not leaving without it.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What are you kidding? Look, when we get back Panama City, you can drop him a nice note. Maybe if you ask politely he'll return it.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: I'm serious!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I bet you are. Oh crap. Look's like your diversion worked a little too well. I don't suppose you have a gun?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: I told you I don't do guns.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: …don't do guns. Great.

Speaker: Chapter 5
Text: “I’m Not Leaving Without It”
[Nate grabs a mercenary and takes the gun from him.]

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Oh no! Son of a bitch!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I'll take that.
[Heroes go on.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: C’mon, down here.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Here, I’ll hold it up, you slide under.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Got it. Ok, I’m clear. More of Guerro's thugs! Crap. I thought there was a ladder.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: …don't wanna cut myself.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Alright, I'll help you up. Ready?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Up you go.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Wait there. I'll find a rope or something. Whoa… look out!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Kind of a heavy rope.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Sorry. It's all I could find.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Up this way.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Guerro's men! This way. Lift me up again. C'mon, over here. Nate, look out. Nate? Oh my God, that was so close.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You can say that again. Just stay when you are, get down, stay out of sight. I'll find a way to get to you.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: I'll keep an eye out for patrols…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Let's hope you don't find any… Crap… crap! Woah, that was close! Ohhh!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nate! I've spotted more of Guerro's men. Drake! Nate!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I'm up… What am I doing?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh thank god, I thought you were hurt…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I told you to stay down, you could get us killed, or worse.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: I thought you'd want to know about a patrol…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Oh, ok. Fine.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: But if you don't want me to warn you…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: No really.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Fine.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Chase… ok, this way.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Look! They're down there! Hey, it's up this way.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Okay-- OH, get back. Back.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: You what are you doing?

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: General, I was just looking for…

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Admiring the view, uh?

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: No sir.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Just standing around while the rest of the compound burns to the ground.

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: No, no, sir, I was looking for the girl, she…

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Round up some men and put out those fires!

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Yes, sir.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Must I give the orders for everything?!

Speaker: Dante
Text: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. Get your hands off me. You know how much this shirt cost?

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Senor Dante, I think it's time we finished our little talk. Bring him.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Look, buddy. I know you're just followin' orders, but If you touch me again, I'm breaking your goddamn fingers.

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Move.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: At least we know he's still alive.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I once saw Dante talk his way out of La Sabaneta. The prison in Venezuela that's famous for the… never mind.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: You're saying Dante can talk his way out of anything? Yeah, I get that. Ok, Guerro's headquarters are up that way.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Place is going to be crawlin' with his men. How did you get through?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Warehouse. They bring in the supplies through the silos.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Oh, alright, y'know, wait here. I'll see if I can take care of some of these guys quietly.

Speaker: Chapter 6
Text: “I’ll Break Your Fingers”

Speaker: Marisa
Text: I came down a ladder here… Oh no. The ladder's gone.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Of course it is. Alright, wait there. I'll find another way up.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Watch out! Try going under that shack… Careful now. Wait… look out! Guerro's men!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Not good. Not good. That was close!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Where did you learn to do that? You really did grow up in a circus.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: God no. Terrified of clowns. Crap. Stay down.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: I came through here…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Alright, here we go. Alright, go!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: God, it weighs a ton.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Boy, it's stuck.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: It's not going to move…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: One more.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Whew!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Would you put that away!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What? Why?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: The entire place is filled with these.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Acetone. Great.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah, just breathe too hard and the whole place goes up.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Nice. Ok, c'mon, this way.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Crap…
[Nate and Marisa stumble upon mercenaries. After the fight the find a huge door…]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Chase, over here. C'mon, give me a hand with this.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Ok.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Ready?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yep.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Alright, go!
[At an elevator.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: This is how I got down. Damn it, uh, it was working before.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Sounded like they were trying to fix it.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Ok, so… what now?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Alright, y'know what? Wait here. I'll go up there and see If I can get it running.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Of course you will.
[As Nate climbs up we hear Marisa’s voice.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Raised in a circus, I'm telling you. Nate! Oh, thank god. Nice work.

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: I'm sorry, sir. The lift… the repairs have taken longer…

Speaker: Guerro
Text: How long, soldado… eh?

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Sanchez, sir.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Sanchez. Flow long?

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: A few more hours, at least…

Speaker: Guerro
Text: No, no, no. You misunderstand me. I meant to say, how long is it that you have been this incompetent?

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: General… I do not understand.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Oh you don't?
[Guerro throws him from the balcony.]

Speaker: Dante
Text: What the hell? That's uh… some leadership skills you got there… Your men must love you.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: I do not seek their love, only their respect.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Ho oh, well, I bet you got that.  Hey, what am I, invisible?

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: General… there's still no sign of them.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: They must be found. Search the entire camp. They can't have gone far.

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Yes sir. Of course, sir.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Hey, hey! We need them alive.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: I give the orders around here, senor Dante, not you.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Look, unless you wanna just keep pushin' these shitty narcotics to finance this little war of yours, you gotta start listenin' to me.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: If I was not already a very good listener senor Dante, you would be down there, keeping soldado… Sanchez company. You know, perhaps that is not such a bad idea.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Ok, ok, ok, ok, ok, I'm sorry. I'm sorry! But look, we need them alive Chase is holdin' out on us. We don't know what she don't know, and Drake? He found more up there in ten minutes than the old man found in, like, twenty years.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Old man?

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Momento. Si. Bueno. Get the men ready. My trucks are returning with more men and supplies. If we do not find your friends before they arrive… this industrious soldado Sanchez? He's looking very lonely.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Me? C'mon, why me? If you woulda hired the kinda guys you don't have to chuck over the railing, Drake never would have escaped. C'mon, they let a girl get.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Talk, talk, talk. You! Get in there and fix that lift.

Speaker: Dante
Text: General!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nate??? What's taking so long?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Chase, I've released the brake. It's on its way down. Let me know when you're ready.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: OK. Nate, I'm ready.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Crap. Power's out. Just stay in the cage. I'll find another way to get you up. Counter weight. Bingo.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Ok, I'm clear! I put-the brake on. I thought I heard Dante's voice.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You did.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Where is he?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: He went that way, with his new pal the General.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Huh, he cut a deal with Guerro.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: They seemed pretty chummy, yeah.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: See? I knew he'd cut you out… Hey? 'Partner'?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: From what I hear you already have a partner.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Who? Dante? No, you've…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: No, no, no. I overheard them talking, something about an 'old man'?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nate, look…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Eh, you know what? I wet it. Part of your 'long story', right?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Look, the road's on the other side of Guerro's headquarters. Help me find my amulet Once the coast is clear I will tell you everything.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Alright fine. You're nothing if not persistent.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: C'mon, over here.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Whoah, look out.
[The bridge they walk collapsing under their feet.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Look out! Woah! Oh! Nate? You okay?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah… Yeah I'm ok. Jesus, doesn't Guerro ever fix anything around here?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Can you climb back up?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Uh yeah. Just wait there.
[Nate finds a pickaxe and cleans it up.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: You found a pick.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah. Know who it belongs to?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: No, no. Probably just belonged to one of the archaeologists at the site. Hey, come on.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: C'mon. Guerro's headquarters are this way.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Get back.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Hey, that hurts, what are you doing?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Sorry, but i you want to get your amulet back, we have to do this my way. Look.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Got it. Like I told you, I'm not an expert. So what now?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: We have to get in there?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Ok, wait here.
[Nate defeats all the mercenaries, and they go on.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Come on, through here.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hey, hey, hold up.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: What? It's all clear…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Could we… just find a way In that doesn't scream come kill us?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Ok, alright… I'm all for that.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Over here. I'm going to boost you Up. Alright, see if you can get in through there, then find a rope or something…

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Ok, lets go.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Without getting yourself killed.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Hey, I'm learning.
[Nate gives Marisa a boost.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Good lord.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Sorry. I keep stepping on your fingers. Hey, I'm gonna go find that rope.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Alright, hurry, but be careful.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Be careful. I get it. I'll be right back.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: And make it an actual rope this time… I'm sick of climbing crates.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Grenades. Hello!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: How long's it takes to find a rope?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nate, here.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hey, what, did you get lost?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Well it's not like they keep boxes of ropes by every window you know.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hey, wait. You gotta wait for me.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: I already checked this room, remember? It's clear. See? I am learning.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah, let's just hope you don't learn the hard way.
[As Nate climb up the roof he sees mercenary choking Marisa.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Chase…
[He beat the shit out of him.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hey, you OK?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah, I'm fine.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Y'know, things would go a lot smoother if you'd use one of these. I know. You can’t. Another one of your long stories.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Ok, Guerro's offices are in a loft above the garage bay.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Uh wait, wait, wait, wait. Let me go first this time.

Speaker: Chapter 9
Text: “He Gave Them Everything”

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Hey, Guerro's thugs were loading up these trucks. My amulet might be inside.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Alright, I’ll take a look. But hurry.
[After short gunfight…]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Well?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nothin'. It's gotta be here somewhere. Let's go check Guerro's office. Guerro's office is up these stairs. Hey, this is it! This is it! Oh, locked?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah. Alright. Alright, you just wait here. I'll uh…

Speaker: Marisa
Text: …find another way in. Yeah. I got it.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Woah. That is a lot of dynamite.
[Nate finds the way into the office and open its door for Marisa.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hey. Chase, what is all this?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh my God, he's given them everything Maps, papers, photographs… they've gutted the entire field office. C'mon, we have to gather as much of this stuff as we…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Stop. You wanna know why we're not 'partners'?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: What? Why?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Gathering all this? - took years. Dante's a two-bit grave robber. He couldn't have done any of this It's time you tell me your 'long story.'

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nate, look…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Remember you were the one who asked me to trust you.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Ok, ok, you're right. I'm sorry. It's just that things have been a little crazy around here.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Things are always crazy… but I'm flying blind here.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: This is my grandfather, Vincent Perez. Twenty years ago, the mining company discovered all of this… The grave site the ruins. The IOA was called in and my grandfather ran the dig site.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: So all this research was his. He found the amulet.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: He tried for twenty years to figure out what it meant.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: What happened?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: He ran out of time. Last year he was diagnosed with terminal cancer.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Chase… I'm sorry.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah, well, he wasn't sorry. He was desperate. He I decided to hire someone who had special 'contacts'… y’know, someone who could deal with Guerro.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Dante.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: And then three months later he… he just vanished… he… he disappeared.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You don't think it was Dante, do you? Nah, uh, Dante's a lot of things, but he's no murderer. A thief? Yes.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Look, all I know is, Dante took over the entire operation and then… he just gave it to Guerro.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Well, lust because he has It, doesn't mean he gets to keep it. I say we grab as much stuff as we can carry and Wt get the hell out of here.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Thank you! Ok, the maps are too big to carry, so, um… take as many photos as you can.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Nathan Drake, world famous photographer.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Who knew? A friend of Dante's would turn out to be a nice guy…

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Uh, just remember where nice guys usually finish…
[Nate starts taking photos of every map with Marisa’s camera.]

Speaker: Marisa
Text: My amulet's gotta be here somewhere.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Keep looking. You'll find it.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: I can't believe Dante gave all this to Guerro.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: I can. Dante will do anything if there's money in it.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh. Sounds like the voice of experience.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Well, you know, not anything.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Hey, you take all those map photos yet?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Hey, do they have to be in focus? Just kidding. There. I think that's all of them.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Great. At least one of us got something. It's not here. My amulet… it's gone.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Wait. Look around. Guerro must have a safe. I found it. Here.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Hey, hey. This was with Guerro's papers. You think it might be the combination?

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Well if his security is in the same condition as everything else around here, it might be. Let me see.
[Nate opens combination lock and finds the amulet.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: This is what you're looking for?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh, thank god. I don't know what I would have done if I'd lost it. Someone's coming! Whoa… I'm going.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Oh crap! Quick, hide.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh no.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: No, not in… the truck with all the dynamite. Damn it.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Move this out of here. Oh, and uh, drive very carefully. There's enough dynamite in here to blow up half of Panama, uh? Heh.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Blowin' shit up, hey that never gets old, does it?

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Senor Dante, you seem to be running out of time.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yeah, eh, about that. Um… You know I was thinking… General, maybe we don't need them after all.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: Well that's very strange. Earlier, you were singing a different song.

Speaker: Dante
Text: I know, I know. But hear me out here I mean half your compound is on fire, right? Drake's probably more trouble than he's worth.

Speaker: Guerro
Text: The other trucks will be here soon. Ready the rest of the gear, huh? Forgive me. Continue.

Speaker: Dante
Text: Yeah, all I was sayin’ is that Drake – is just a – he’s a pain in my ass, and Chase, well, you know what she is.
[Nate defeats all the mercenaries and sees someone Chase choking again.]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Not again! Why don't you pick on someone your own size, you son of a bitch. Chase… ooh, nice. Now get the hell out of there.

Speaker: Chapter 10
Text: “That Makes Three of Us”

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Steady…

Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: There, she's by the bridge.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: C'mon, Chase, move!

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Okay… Okay… I'm moving.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Where are these guys comin' from? Keep moving… Not more… crap! Go go…

Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Stop her.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Oh, no, no no… Why are you stopping?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: The pipe's loose.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Are you kidding me?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Getting shot, falling to my death, there a difference?
[After the fight…]

Speaker: Nathan
Text: You OK?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Yeah, oh, thanks. For a second there I thought I was done for.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Still think that amulet is worth all this trouble?

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Oh, you have no idea.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Yeah, well, you got that much right.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: Nate, trucks are coming!

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Ah crap.

Speaker: Marisa
Text: A lot of trucks.

Speaker: Nathan
Text: Get down!
